text.text_translated:
I think it is interesting to think about our future.
We can help people to change and develop faster.
We can do this by adding technology to our bodies.
This will improve us in many ways.
For example, we can put a computer in our brain.
Soon, we will be able to do this.
A computer in our brain can help us.
It can improve our ability with numbers.
It can make us see and hear better.
It can also make our memory stronger.
In the future, this idea will be very common.
